lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish can handle three weeks at the Tour de France and still contend for track gold at the Rio Olympics, according to one of his former coaches at Team Sky.

headline.print_headline: Cycling: Cavendish Can Handle Tour and Olympics, Says Former Coach
headline.main: Cycling: Cavendish Can Handle Tour and Olympics, Says Former Coach

snippet: Mark Cavendish can handle three weeks at the Tour de France and still contend for track gold at the Rio Olympics, according to one of his former coaches at Team Sky....
